p: Weekly influenza-like syndrome (ILS) incidence was provided by the French Sentinelles Network ( http://websenti.u707.jussieu.fr/sentiweb) [10]. This network defines ILS as the combination of the following clinical symptoms: sudden onset of fever ≥39°C, myalgias and respiratory symptoms, eg dyspnea and/or cough. The data are presented as ILS incidence per 100,000 inhabitants.
